market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, approved plan, initiation form, electricity bill, photographs.
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located in Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District. 
• Land area as per sale deed and plan is 1,350 sft (150 sq yd).
• Built-up area as per sale deed and registration plan is 3,840 sft (G+2 floors).
• Valuation is based on comparable sales in the Green Villas locality and recent market transactions.
• The property has amenities such as modular kitchens, wardrobes, and split AC provision.
• The plot is fully demarcated and easily identifiable; no deviations observed in setbacks or area.
• Construction is complete and of good quality; both interior and exterior are in good condition.
• The property is self-occupied by the buyer.
• No unit or vertical deviation observed.
• The property is not within a protected or regulated area.
• Expected future physical life based on visual inspection is 55 years.
• It is assumed that the property title is clear and all necessary approvals have been obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 24 June 2025 is INR 17,280,000/- [Seventeen Million Two Hundred Eighty Thousand Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
